content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MICHELIN Brand Proposition\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With a heritage rooted in mobility, French entrepreneurs Andre and Edouard Michelin started their tyre company 120 years ago.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mapping out a guide of the best hotels and restaurants to visit on a journey soon followed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Through this iconic heritage, the tyre company, maps and the world-renowned restaurant guide have grown under the MICHELIN Travel Partners family.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travelling to create new experiences is key to Michelin's platform.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":502219,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/55d6236a-ef7d-4d53-a1b3-6b26da51960e/Capture5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/55d6236a-ef7d-4d53-a1b3-6b26da51960e/Capture5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture5.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"55d6236a-ef7d-4d53-a1b3-6b26da51960e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":696,\"height\":430},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
